hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common

Class BombermanBaseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.BombermanBaseModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientModel, ServerModel

    public abstract class BombermanBaseModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The base model for client and server. It provides function that both sides need.
    Author:
    Marco Egger
